<CrystalLeaderboardDelegate> Protocol Reference

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(void) - crystalLeaderboardUpdated:
 Reports to the client that a leaderboard has been updated.
(void) - crystalLeaderboardUpdated:leaderboardType:
 Reports to the client that a leaderboard has been updated This method is mor accurate version of the above notification and capable of notifying the observer for all leaderboard types.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) crystalLeaderboardUpdated: (NSString *)  DEPRECATED_ATTRIBUTE [optional]

Reports to the client that a leaderboard has been updated.

Deprecated:
This method has now been deprecated in favour of the more accurate notification below. This method will only get called for leaderboards of the type CLTGlobal, the default.
Parameters:
leaderboardIdThe leaderboard ID that has been updated. This will match the leaderboard ID on the Developer Dashboard
- (void) crystalLeaderboardUpdated: (NSString *)  leaderboardId
leaderboardType: (CrystalLeaderboardType)  leaderboardType 
[required]

Reports to the client that a leaderboard has been updated This method is mor accurate version of the above notification and capable of notifying the observer for all leaderboard types.

Parameters:
leaderboardIdThe leaderboard ID that has been updated. This will match the leaderboard ID on the Developer Dashboard
